title: Victoria sponge ginger cake
ingredients: ['Weigh 3 medium eggs in their shells.', 'Self Raising flour - the same weight as the eggs.', 'Caster sugar - the same weight as the eggs', 'Butter or soft margarine - the same weight as the eggs.', 'Half a teaspoon of ground ginger (more if you like an intense ginger flavour)', '4 oz. sieved Icing Sugar - for the filling', '2 oz. soft butter or margarine - for the filling', '2 balls stem ginger finely chopped + 2 teasp. syrup from the jar - for the filling']
